fields.name: Salvage value
fields.formula: if(field('Replacement date') > today(),field('Purchase cost in dollars') - date_diff('month',field('Purchase date'), today()) * field('Monthly depreciation'),0)

fields.name: Replacement date
fields.formula: field('Purchase date') + date_interval(concat(field('Depreciation period in months'),' months'))

fields.name: Monthly depreciation
fields.formula: round(field('Purchase cost in dollars') / field('Depreciation period in months'),2)

fields.name: Total asset cost by staff member
Total salvage value by staff member
Average asset cost by staff member
fields.formula: field('Total asset cost by department') / field('Number of staff members')

fields.name: Price difference
fields.formula: field('Price') - lookup('Replaces asset','Purchase cost in dollars')
